content: This inner hall is teeming with tons of Worm Practitioners all over the lower walkway, with a Snake Sheriff patrolling up some stairs ahead. On the plus side, many of the Worm Practitioners are lying out in the sun and won't react until you get close, so you can either ignore them, or sneak up to hit them with charge attacks before finishing them off.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Temple_of_Yellow_Flowers_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Temple of Yellow Flowers Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Temple Entrance'.
The content is as follows:
This inner hall is teeming with tons of Worm Practitioners all over the lower walkway, with a Snake Sheriff patrolling up some stairs ahead. On the plus side, many of the Worm Practitioners are lying out in the sun and won't react until you get close, so you can either ignore them, or sneak up to hit them with charge attacks before finishing them off.
